meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>round</kanji> and <kanji>slippery</kanji> just moves around with no trouble at all. It is so <vocabulary>effortless</vocabulary> in how it slides around. It is also super <vocabulary>smooth</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
